transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir. Hello. Haan ji sir good morning Sandeep baat kar raha hu sir aapka account manager.
Customer: Ji Sandeep. Ji sir.
Executive: Ji ji main bol raha tha sir kuch issues vagera aa rahe hain kya sir aapko ek payment ko lekar ke abhi main dekh raha hu. Office chair ka kisi ne aapko matlab ki wo kya sir?
Customer: Nahi unko unka issue ye tha ki unhone humse rate liya tha 12 chair ka 12 chair ka.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ji sir to 12 chair ke rate diye the to unhone baad mein ek chair ki demand ki ki ek chair de do to main kaha ek chair nahi ho payegi usme na kyuki rate jo hai wo wholesale ke rate the.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Rate bhi diya tha unhone ek ek hafta 10 din reply nahi kiya fir achanak ek din advance dala to main kaha jaldi nahi ho payega to fir unka advance maine wapis kar diya agar aap chahe to aapke whatsapp number pe main share kar dunga kal de diya tha unko advance wapis.
Executive: Achcha un unko aapne paisa de diya matlab jo ha ₹5000 maine diya tha humne unko ₹5000 wapis de diya tha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Achcha nahi kyuki aapka na ye complaint raise ho rakha hai 14th November ko ye hua tha na shayad?
Customer: Haan meri main phone aaya tha maine usi time bol diya tha. Maine kaha wo client keh raha hai kyuki wo unhone bas thoda sa kuch jyada jaldi hai wo hamesha client subah kehta hai ki bhai payment dalwa raha hu main aur chair aap ready kara do to main kaha kara do fir sham ko achanak phone aata hai 6 baje ki paise dalwao aaj dal jayegi chair. Bhai 6 baje office band ho jata hai kahan se dal jayegi chair aap?
Executive: Hmm. To wo ₹5000 ek hi chair ek chair ke liye ₹5000 usne ek chair nahi 10 chair unki jani thi jisme ₹8000 kuch amount ban raha tha. ₹5000 unhone diya tha ₹3000 baad mein karna tha. To jo ₹5000 ki payment thi wo maine unko wapis dal di thi. Jis account se aayi thi us account mein dal di.
Executive: To kab kiya tha aapne late kiya tha kya kuch kyuki complaint agar customer ne kiya hai to at the time aapne quick nahi kiya hoga maybe aapne late kiya hoga. Aapne nahi nahi turant kiya hai turant agar humne payment uski payment wapis kar di hai kal ki hai humne.
Executive: Achcha achcha nahi actually kya hota hai ki agar koi bhi sir aapke side se agar kuch bhi galti hota hai matlab ki agar payment aapne liya hai customer ka ya to aap mal nahi beja rahe ya payment nahi kara rahe ho to aapka na account deactivate bhi ho jata hai IndiaMART ki taraf se. Thik hai to wo ek aapko matlab ki ha ek education aapko matlab ki wo dena tha ki aapko batana tha ki koi bhi matlab ki ye hota hai fraud type ka thik hai kyuki abhi aapke upar matlab ki ek ticket open ho rakha hai ki ₹5000 ka jo hai jo wallet hai wo aapne matlab ki customer se liya lekin unko pay nahi kiya. Wo abhi bhi open hai. To aapko sir India ha IndiaMART ke jo BS conflict ka jo ek team hoti hai alag team hoti hai usse call to aaya hoga aapko shayad. Baat hui kisi se?
Customer: Sir aisa nahi jo ha meri baat hui thi maine kaha sir kal hi meri baat hui thi aur maine unko bola tha ki sir kuch issue aa raha hai ki hum unka advance wapis unka dal rahe hain usse hamari baat ho gayi hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha aapki baat hui hai. Agar proof vagera chahiye to main advance return ka nahi wo unhone kaha thik hai aap kar dijiye main isko close kar deta hu.
Executive: Achcha nahi ticket kyuki na abhi bhi open hi hai to usi liye ha usi liye mujhe lag raha hai ki sir aapko chahiye aap number de de main aapko whatsapp kar deta hu. Jo payment wapis kiya uske sir aap whatsapp kar hi dena. Thik hai main wo dekh lunga. Baki kuch service mein leke kuch issues to nahi aa rahe sir aapko?
Customer: Hai wo thoda bahut hai main baithunga ek din bula ke kyuki mujhe lagta hai kaam isi wajah se nahi aata hai kyuki humne jab us time hamare paas time tha nahi jab ye package humne liya tha jaldi jaldi mein le liya tha.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Aapko to sir maine bataya sir aapke business ke liye jo suitable package tha us pe aap agar aap jate to us pe aapko revenue matlab ki jo conversion milega. Wo baat bilkul perfect keh rahe ho sari baatein main bilkul maan raha hu lekin kam se kam jitna lagaya maine ₹1 lakh lagaya aapke sir to aana chahiye kam se kam utna to aana chahiye to aur behtar ke liye kuch aa hi nahi raha na aane ka reason yahi hai ki mujhe lagta hai hamari jo profile hai wo tarike se update nahi hui matlab keyword vagera photograph vagera content vagera wo tarike se nahi hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji. Ye bhi reason ho sakta hai main manta hu.
Executive: Uske liye to sir thoda sa kaam karna padega ki keywords vagera mujhe lagta hai package jab main le raha tha us time bahut jaldi mein tha to maine diya wo process agar time se bita diya us time hota to baad me multi wise har aadmi apna apna kaam karta hai kya wo ho gaya. Haan wo to sir hota hai catalog department aapka jo hai na sabse pehle page banati hai aur aap se pehle approval leti hai ki aap apna catalog dekh lo product dekh lo map in sara cheez sahi hai tabhi wo further aapka jo hai wo live hota hai. To wo aapko permission to liya gaya hoga sir. Sir hamare paas us time hamare paas time nahi tha hamari catalog content thi us time ready ho rahi thi to maine kaha tha bhai payment bhale main kar deta hu lekin catalog abhi live mat kariye jab hoga to us time kar dunga fir wo chalo thik hai har aadmi ke upar pressure hota hai live karna wo sari cheeze. Hmm hmm hmm. To abhi main chahunga ki thode din mein ek din baithu aur baithne ke baad jo jo cheeze hume lag raha hai ki ha galat hai jinki wajah se kaam nahi aaya hai. Thik hai. Uske baad fir baithenge aap mere ko contact kar lena sir iske liye thik hai aap jab bhi free ho na aap mere ko whatsapp pe message kar dena aur jo ₹5000 ka sir hai na wo aapne bola payment kar diya wo main aapko hi likh deta hu wo bhi aap proof mere ko bhej do sir. Thik hai main aage forward kar dunga bas ha bhej do main bhej deta hu kyuki chakkar kya hai man lijiye koi customer hai kisi ne de diya wo aap 20 chair ka rate dete ho ek chair ka advance dalta hai fir bhi bahut jyada jaldi jata hai. Ab ek customer hai wo complaint kar rahi hai kisi customer ne hume call kiya udissa se ki aap 50 chair bech dijiye aur payment hum aapko mal pahunchne par denge. Hmm hmm hmm. Wo cheez to sir possible nahi hoga. To hum nahi kar sakte na hum kaise behenge ki aapne ₹1 advance nahi diya aur main udissa mal bech du waha koi mile na mile kaise bech sakta hai. Usne PO bhi beja tha cancel kar diya wo alag cheeze hai na ab to bhai jo kaam hai kaam ke tarike se hoga. Bilkul sir. Wo client ko jiska paaya jayega complaint hai usne rate liya koi aadmi bole main hi bolu ki bhai aap mujhe 100 chair chahiye aur sir 100 chair ki aap rate ₹5000 bologe sir fir baad mein aadmi bole mujhe ek chair chahiye. Kai log badmashi karte hain unko ghar ke liye apne ek chair chahiye hoti to 100 chair bata ke 100 ka rate lete hain. Hmm hmm hmm. Baad mein kehte hain ek chair to wo sari cheeze bhi hai na manage to karni padegi. Sahi baat hai sir aap aap apne side se sahi ho na sir koi dikkat wali baat nahi hai bas sahi confirmation kare. Kyuki agar bahar ki taraf sir complaint aaya to hamara bhi pura rehta hai ki pehle verify kar le aapke side se bhi ki galti matlab kahan hai matlab ki aap bhi apna paksh rakh diye thik hai aapke paas hai koi dikkat wali baat nahi hai. Unko dene ke liye keh raha tha ki bhai ruk jao aap ek do din hum delivery bhi kara denge to unhone kaha nahi nahi mujhe advance chahiye. Fir again nahi advance chahiye to main kaha le lo yaar advance to sari chakkar ho rahi hai achcha achcha. Koi baat nahi thik hai sir koi issue nahi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had refunded advance payment to client.

- Customer received a complaint regarding payment.

- Feels profile is not updated properly.



Resolution:

- Executive verified the refund.

- Executive educated about account deactivation policy.

- Executive asked to share payment proof on WhatsApp.

- Executive offered assistance with profile update.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send payment proof on WhatsApp.

- Customer will contact executive for profile update.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, payment, profile update, complaint
